links.label: associated_with
descriptions: Both are mentioned as Wood-aligned Hours in the same fragment about forest deities.

links.label: opposed_to
descriptions: The fragment describes the Lion-Smith creating monsters to defeat the Colonel, indicating a hostile relationship.
《司辰志·卷二》和《司辰志·卷三》描述狮子匠与伤疤护民官（即上校）的敌对关系，狮子匠创造怪物意图击败上校。
《司辰志·卷三》进一步强调狮子匠和上校的仇怨是'世界的永恒引擎'，两者不可能真正击败对方。

descriptions: Julian Coseley states that the Sun-in-Splendour can be split, though it requires the Forge of Days to do so, implying the Forge created or can alter the Sun.

Lazzari prophesied that the Forge of Days would split the Sun, leading to its death.

拉扎里预言太阳将在锤炼场被白日铸炉分裂，后者的凶器是心中的爱，暗示白日铸炉杀死了骄阳。

圣杯将轰雷之皮摧毁，作为双角斧的手足遭到屠戮的补偿。
